content.description: Awesome steep climbing that traverses the cave and ends at the lip of Hell cave. The crux is right after you clip the 5th bolt.
content.protection: Burning is ten bolts long and ends on a single draw which would be consider the 11th bolt. The draws are usually fixed on the route.
content.location: It starts on the far left side of the cave. The unique thing about Burning is that it traverses to the right to end on the very last bolt at the top right side of the cave. It does not pull the roof out of the cave.

content.description: Cannibals into Melting. Skips the Wizards crux and ends when one is established in the crack (exclude crack traverse, i.e. Burning finish).
content.protection: A small rack of quick draws. Typically fixed, perhaps worth replacing.
content.location: Starts same as Cannibals with V7/8 boulder problem.

content.description: A short route on the far right side of the cave.  Short, overhanging and bouldery.
A steep bouldery route that has it all, hand jams, pockets, and knee bars! A really good route.
content.protection: Quickdraws are usually fixed on the route.
content.location: Shares the same start as Melting but after the pod it heads up and right to finish on the same bolt as Burning.

content.description: This route goes up Melting but once you get to the crack section you traverse left for several bolts until you reach the last bolt on Reaching for Razors, and finish on Reaching for Razors.
content.protection: Quickdraws are usually fixed on the route except for the last 3-4.
content.location: Goes up Melting and finishes on Reaching for Razors.

content.description: This route begins on the right of the cave and goes into the large pod. It then continues left until in joins the 7th bolt on Burning and finishes on Burning.
content.protection: Quickdraws are usually fixed on the route.
content.location: Starts on the right of the cave and goes into Burning.

content.description: Not sure if this link-up has been done before, but either way I think it deserved an official name because it's rad. Basically a harder version of Fryeing. Start on Linus, execute the first crux, then join Burning where the two routes cross. After the Burning crux, traverse into Wizards, then pull bats out of hell.
This is a bouldery route that is in your face right of the ground until you clip the anchor. It crosses Burning at the fourth bolt and ends in the crack above.
content.protection: Quickdraws are usually fixed on the route.
content.location: It begins just right of Burning and goes straight up, crossing Burning at the 4th bolt.

content.description: Starts with a viciously hard boulder problem on steep terrain and bad crimps.  After that, goes into a good undercling rest.  End on Bats out of Hell.
content.location: Starts on the blank looking face between the start of Melting/Wizards and Side-Show Bob's.

content.description: This route begins on Burning and once the 6th bolt is clipped you stay low and go into the Wizards crux and finish by pulling the Bats out of Hell roof.
content.protection: Quickdraws are usually fixed on route.
content.location: Starts on Burning, goes into Wizards, and pulls the lip of the cave.

content.description: A dizzying link-up in the cave with uniquely classic movement. Start on Cannibals and climb to the "mail slot" jug. Once there, do a big move right to an awkwardly shaped crimp on the face between you and the large Wizard's pod. Then swing feet into the pod and heel-toe cam high in the pod. Transfer your weight to your feet and let go of the "mail slot" to dangle for a moment by your feet. Then continue up through Wizards and finish on Bats Out of Hell. Become the Demon-Wizard-Bat.
content.location: Starts between the opening at the back of the cave and Melting on two small undercling crimps in a roof.

content.description:
A bouldery route requiring boatloads of endurance.

The route begins with a V9 boulder problem and then ventures into steep long pulling followed by the crux of Wizards. Head up into underclings for a good rest (no-hands with a decent knee-pad) and then pull the horizontal roof (called "Bats out of Hell"; 12c/d individually).
content.location: Start in the back of the cave near a pod.  Cannibals starts on the right side of the pod; Cannibals Direct starts on the left side of the pod.

content.description: A bouldering and very overhanging endurance fest through the back of the cave.  Start on hard moves into the pod on Wizards (ignore holds on burning), and then continue right up to a rest at the underclings.  Pull Bats Out Of Hell (12 c/d in its own right)
content.protection: bolts to fixed anchors.  generally has draws hanging on it.
content.location: On the right side of the pod on the right side of the cave; to the right of Cannibals Direct and the left of the start of Melting/Wizards
